0.1.name: wordpress/spammer-silent-treatment
0.1.description:
BuddyPress uses the user_status field to classify users as spammers. Users who are marked as spammers should not receive further email notifications from the system.

This plugin filters the To, Cc, and Bcc fields that are passed to wp_mail().

This plugin is a beta release, and as such, is not suitable for deployment on a production server.
